Utility.name: Unique Enchanted Books
Utility.description:
Changes the textures of all Enchanted Books of Vanilla and Et Futurum Requiem to make them look unique. Do note that this only applies to Enchanted Books that are practically accessible. Books that are cheated to have an Enchantment Level over 5 will display with a black band instead.
If you want to see other Enchanted Books from other mods, make sure to suggest them on [Discord](https://discord.gg/cg73PFHvfV)!

requiresefr

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that makes the Enchanted Books consistent with __Darker Leather__.}

Utility.name: Unique Enchanted Books [Colorblind Edition]
Utility.description:
Changes the textures of all Enchanted Books of Vanilla and Et Futurum Requiem to make them look unique. Do note that this only applies to Enchanted Books that are practically accessible. Books that are cheated to have an Enchantment Level over 5 will display with a black band instead.
In this edition, all books display the Enchantment Level in roman numerals so that colorblind players, who can't distinguish the colors, know which level the Books they find have.
If you want to see other Enchanted Books from other mods, make sure to suggest them on [Discord](https://discord.gg/cg73PFHvfV)!

requiresefr

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that makes the Enchanted Books consistent with __Darker Leather__.}
